greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Real part of Product_{k=0..n) (i-k), where i = sqrt(-1).
comment: Shifted version of A003703. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 30 2014
reference: Edmund Landau, Handbuch der Lehre von der Verteilung der Primzahlen, Chelsea Publishing, NY 1953, pp. 561-562, Section 148.
program: (PARI) a(n) = real(prod(k=0, n, I-k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 03 2021
xref: A231530 is the same except for signs.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 29 2014
